</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the waypoint type.

Type can be:
* "MOVE"
* "DESTROY"
* "GETIN"
* "SAD"
* "JOIN"
* "LEADER"
* "GETOUT"
* "CYCLE"
* "LOAD"
* "UNLOAD"
* "TR UNLOAD"
* "HOLD"
* "SENTRY"
* "GUARD"
* "TALK"
* "SCRIPTED"
* "SUPPORT"
* "GETIN NEAREST"
* "DISMISS"
* "AND"
* "OR"

More details at [[Waypoints]].
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''waypointType''' waypoint </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint:  [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[waypointType]] [groupOne,1],
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Mission_Editor:_Waypoints#Select_Type|waypoints description]], [[Waypoints]], [[waypoints]], [[setWaypointType]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<dt class="note">[[User:Ghost77788|Ghost77788]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
With the new sling loading in Arma 3, 2 new waypoint types are added aswell being:
   Drop Cargo and Lift Cargo.
The names for these 2 waypoints are:
   "UNHOOK" and "HOOK".
</dd>
